text: Paresh Shivalkar (born 13 July 1981) is an Indian professional athlete. He is best known as an association football or soccer player.Soccerway.com, P. Shivalkar; retrieved 2012-7-6. ==Career== In 2008-2010, he played for Mahendra United. In 2011-2012, he played for Pune F.C..Goal.com Paresh Shivalkar ; retrieved 2012-7-6. ==References== ==Other websites == * IndianFootball.com, Interview with Paresh Shivalkar Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Indian footballers
